static void edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.CityCategories.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00029                                                             {
00030         // create output directory
00031         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("citycategories");
00032         final boolean SMALL = true;
00033         
00034         // read input (crop to cover China)
00035         LatLonGrid pop    = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.WORLD);
00036         if (SMALL){
00037             pop = pop.crop(900, 6000, 800, 1600); // China mainly
00038         }
00039         KmlWriter.write(pop, out, "modelpop", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00040         
00041         LatLonGrid nightTimeLights = NightimeLights.read(NightimeLights.WORLD).remapTo(pop);
00042         KmlWriter.write(nightTimeLights, out, "modellights", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00043         
00044         EnhancedWatershedSegmenter seg = new EnhancedWatershedSegmenter(10, 1, 600, 10, 5);
00045         LabelResult allcities = seg.label(pop);     
00046         KmlWriter.write(allcities.label, out, "modelcities", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00047 
00048         // write out cluster file
00049         String filename = out.getAbsolutePath()+"/citydata.txt";
00050         PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(filename));
00051         writer.println("Pop light");
00052         RegionProperty[] population = RegionProperty.compute(allcities, pop);
00053         RegionProperty[] lighting = RegionProperty.compute(allcities, nightTimeLights);
00054         for (int i=1; i < population.length; ++i){
00055             writer.println(population[i].getCval() + " " + lighting[i].getCval());
00056         }
00057         writer.close();
00058         System.out.println("Wrote " + filename);
00059         
00060         // compute the category of each (based on clustering result)
00061         int[] categories = new int[population.length];
00062         for (int i=1; i < categories.length; ++i){
00063             categories[i] = computeCategory( population[i].getCval(), lighting[i].getCval() );
00064         }
00065         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(allcities.label);
00066         result.setMissing(0);
00067         result.fill(result.getMissing());
00068         for (int i=0; i < result.getNumLat(); ++i){
00069             for (int j=0; j < result.getNumLon(); ++j){
00070                 int cityno = allcities.label.getValue(i,j);
00071                 if ( cityno > 0 ){
00072                     result.setValue(i,j, categories[cityno]);
00073                 }
00074             }
00075         }
00076         KmlWriter.write(result, out, "citycategories", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00077     }
